data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
The first-half is just kicking off.
Sochi awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sochi have been awarded a corner by Evgeni Turbin.
Ibrahim Tsallagov of Sochi gets in a strike, but is off target.
Evgeni Turbin awards Orenburg a goal kick.
Free kick for Sochi in their own half.
Evgeni Turbin signals a free kick to Orenburg in their own half.
Can Sochi get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Orenburg's half?
Sochi to take a throw-in in Orenburg territory.
Free kick for Sochi in the half of Orenburg.
Sochi's Kirill Zaika gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sochi.
Joel Fameyeh for Orenburg gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Sochi at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
Orenburg drive upfield and Ricardo Alves gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Sochi defender.
Orenburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Sochi capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Orenburg's half?
Evgeni Turbin signals a free kick to Sochi in their own half.
Evgeni Turbin signals a throw-in for Sochi, close to Orenburg's area.
Timofey Margasov (Sochi) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Free kick for Orenburg in their own half.
Evgeni Turbin signals a Orenburg throw-in in Sochi's half.
Throw-in for Orenburg at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
Throw-in Orenburg.
Orenburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Evgeni Turbin blows against Sochi's Aleksandr Kokorin for offside.
Evgeni Turbin signals a free kick to Sochi in their own half.
In Sochi Orenburg drive forward through Djordje Despotovic. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Sochi.
Orenburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Own goal in Sochi! Timur Ayupov scores in his own net to make it 1-0.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Sochi is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Sochi have a dangerous throw-in.
In Sochi a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In Sochi, Ibrahim Tsallagov (Sochi) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Corner awarded to Sochi.
Ball goes out of play for a Orenburg goal kick.
Sochi needs to be cautious. Orenburg have an attacking throw-in.
At Fisht Olympic Stadium, Orenburg are penalized for being offside.
An attacking Sochi player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
Ricardo Alves of Orenburg smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Sochi have extended their lead to 2-0 courtesy of a Aleksandr Kokorin penalty.
Throw-in for Orenburg close to the penalty box.
Evgeni Turbin signals a free kick to Sochi.
Throw-in for Sochi in the half of Orenburg.
Sochi's Andrey Mostovoy is on target but unsuccessful.
Sochi have been awarded a corner by Evgeni Turbin.
Free kick Orenburg.
Free kick for Orenburg in their own half.
Sochi have a goal kick.
Free kick for Sochi in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Orenburg in Sochi.
Throw-in for Sochi in their own half.
Evgeni Turbin awards the home team a throw-in.
Orenburg will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Sochi.
Sochi push forward at Fisht Olympic Stadium and Aleksandr Kokorin gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Orenburg defence.
Sochi have been awarded a corner by Evgeni Turbin.
The first-half has come to a close in Sochi.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Orenburg close to the penalty box.
Corner awarded to Orenburg.
Mikhail Sivakov (Orenburg) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Timur Ayupov (Orenburg) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Filip Rogic (Orenburg) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Evgeni Turbin signals a free kick to Sochi in their own half.
Free kick for Sochi in the half of Orenburg.
Free kick Orenburg.
Throw-in high up the field for Orenburg in Sochi.
Evgeni Turbin signals a Orenburg throw-in in Sochi's half.
Throw-in for Orenburg at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
In Sochi, Filip Rogic of Orenburg is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Ball goes out of play for a Sochi goal kick.
Evgeni Turbin awards the away team a throw-in.
Evgeni Turbin signals a throw-in for Sochi, close to Orenburg's area.
Orenburg have a dangerous throw-in.
Sochi awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sochi awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Orenburg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sochi's half?
Sochi have been awarded a corner by Evgeni Turbin.
Evgeni Turbin awards Orenburg a goal kick.
Sochi are pushing forward but Aleksandr Kokorin's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Orenburg at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
Orenburg needs to be cautious. Sochi have an attacking throw-in.
Goal! Sochi extend their lead to 3-0 through Aleksandr Kokorin.
Christian Noboa instrumental with a fine assist.
Orenburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Orenburg make their first substitution with Mamadou Sylla replacing Ricardo Alves.
Evgeni Turbin signals a free kick to Orenburg in their own half.
The away team replace Mikhail Sivakov with Georgi Zotov.
Evgeni Turbin signals a throw-in for Sochi, close to Orenburg's area.
In Sochi a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Corner awarded to Orenburg.
Free kick for Sochi in their own half.
Evgeni Turbin signals a free kick to Sochi.
Can Orenburg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sochi's half?
Evgeni Turbin signals a free kick to Orenburg in their own half.
The home team have replaced Ibrahim Tsallagov with Dusan Lagator. This is the first substitution made today by Vladimir Fedotov.
Sochi take a comfortable 4-0 lead thanks to Andrey Mostovoy.
Orenburg drives forward and Mamadou Sylla gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Vladimir Fedotov (Sochi) is making a second substitution, with Elmir Nabiullin replacing Kirill Zaika.
Throw-in Orenburg.
Andrea Chukanov is on a sub for Filip Rogic for Orenburg.
Throw-in for Sochi in the half of Orenburg.
Free kick Orenburg.
Sochi have been awarded a corner by Evgeni Turbin.
Goal! Christian Noboa extends Sochi lead to 5-0 with a header.
Vladimir Fedotov is making the team's third substitution at Fisht Olympic Stadium with Aleksandre Karapetian replacing Anton Zabolotnyi.
Corner awarded to Orenburg.
Orenburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Orenburg pushes forward through Mamadou Sylla, whose finish on goal is saved.
Throw-in for Orenburg in their own half.
Goal! Joel Fameyeh pulls one back to make it 5-1.
Free kick for Sochi in their own half.
Joel Fameyeh (Orenburg) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Sochi are in shooting range from this free kick.
Sochi are coming forward and Christian Noboa gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sochi.
Can Sochi get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Orenburg's half?
Sochi's Aleksandr Kokorin misses with an attempt on goal.
Orenburg have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Sochi is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal kick for Orenburg at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
2 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Sochi.
In Sochi a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Orenburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Sochi to take a throw-in in Orenburg territory.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 5-1.
